experiences.title: Frontend Developer at Novicell
experiences.description: Building large-scale B2B and B2C e-commerce platforms. Working with Vue, Nuxt, TypeScript, HTML and CSS. Refining and estimating user stories, code reviews, debugging. Collaboration with backend developers, designers and testers. Working in a SCRUM environment.

experiences.title: UI Developer at Grundfos
experiences.description: Prototyping app concepts and designing interfaces in Figma. Building a landing page for an internal hackathon in React. Conceptualizing VR training spaces.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer & UX/UI Designer at ParkShare
experiences.description: Building a landing page and a booking system in React. Designing new features in Figma.
